ygData.subject: Re: Amazon (Amazon Warrior)
ygData.msgSnippet: and what they do to themselves, no? I think most men would find the REAL (as in the actual Greek myth) amazons a scary and disturbing race.  The connotation of
ygData.messageBody:
and what they do to themselves, no?

I think most men would find the REAL (as in the actual Greek myth) amazons a
scary and disturbing race. The connotation of the modern term is more sexy,
IMHO.

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 7:23 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Amazon (Amazon Warrior)
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> Although warrior is gender neutral, I kind of like Amazon or Amazon
> Warrior
> myself. Sends a good message to the men that spend their time trying to
> flirt with me instead of fighting. Anyone that knows anything about
> Amazons
> knows what they do to male children!
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

> Patty of Halas
